answers.answer: I don't have it but my friend did. She had extremely high blood pressure, protein in her urine, and ridiculous amounts of swelling all over her body

I have preeclampsia. My first symptom was a three back to back blood pressure readings of 173/101 . When that happened they immediately booked me in a room and gave me steroid shots for the baby (I was only 28 Weeks) nd kept me for two days. I'm now on 2 prescription for it and I'll be delivering at 36 Weeks (I'll be 35 tomorrow) so yeah. And the protein was low but still higher than normal. My big big problem is the blood pressure

My blood pressure fluctuates but isnt really high but they say that it does that in the beginning before it starts rising. My biggest problem is I have had a persistent headache going on 5 days. My protein isn't really high but it was abnormal. I am being induced at 37 weeks unless something changes then they will induce earlier.
Oh yeah the headaches are the worst. Best wishes to you

question: Is anyone diagnosed with preeclampsia? What were your first symptoms? I am 34 weeks 3 days and was diagnosed two days ago based off a 24 hour urine.
title: preeclampsia
